verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> and unto his sons וְאֶל֙ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> to זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> unto them This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> What אִישׁ֙ <WH376> man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> soever [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִשְׁחַ֜ט <WH7819> that killeth שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> an ox אוֹ־ <WH176> or כֶ֛שֶׂב <WH3775> or lamb אוֹ־ <WH176> or עֵ֖ז <WH5795> or goat בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> in the camp א֚וֹ <WH176> or אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יִשְׁחַ֔ט <WH7819> or that killeth מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> [it] out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> of the camp

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> it not unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֮ <WH4150> of the congregation לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הֱבִיאוֹ֒ <WH935> And bringeth לְהַקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> to offer קָרְבָּן֙ <WH7133> an offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood יֵחָשֵׁ֞ב <WH2803> shall be imputed לָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> unto that man הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood שָׁפָ֔ךְ <WH8210> he hath shed וְנִכְרַ֛ת <WH3772> shall be cut off הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and that man הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> the reason אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָבִ֜יאוּ <WH935> may bring בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> To the end that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽת־ <WH853> זִבְחֵיהֶם֮ <WH2077> their sacrifices אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֵ֣ם <WH1992> they זֹבְחִים֮ <WH2076> which they offer עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֒ <WH7704> field וֶֽהֱבִיאֻ֣ם <WH935> even that they may bring לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> them unto the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> at פֶּ֛תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> unto the priest וְזָ֨בְח֜וּ <WH2076> and offer זִבְחֵ֧י <WH2077> offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <WH8002> them [for] peace לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְזָרַ֨ק <WH2236> shall sprinkle הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> upon the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהִקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> and burn הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> the fat לְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> for a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall no יִזְבְּח֥וּ <WH2076> And they shall no more offer עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer אֶת־ <WH853> זִבְחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2077> their sacrifices לַשְּׂעִירִ֕ם <WH8163> unto devils אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they זֹנִ֖ים <WH2181> whom they have gone a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> This shall be a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <WH5769> for ever תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become זֹּ֥את <WH2063> likewise לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH1755> unto them throughout their generations

וַאֲלֵהֶ֣ם <WH413> then תֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> And thou shalt say אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> unto them Whatsoever man אִישׁ֙ <WH376> man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> or of the strangers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> which sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> you that offereth עֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> a burnt offering אוֹ־ <WH176> or זָֽבַח׃ <WH2077> or sacrifice

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> it not unto the door אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not יְבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <WH935> And bringeth לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to offer אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> it unto the LORD וְנִכְרַ֛ת <WH3772> shall be cut off הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> even that man הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he מֵעַמָּֽיו׃ <WH5971> from among his people

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And whatsoever man אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [there be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> among אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> you that eateth כָּל־ <WH3605> any דָּ֑ם <WH1818> any manner of blood וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> I will even set פָנַ֗י <WH6440> my face בַּנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> against that soul הָאֹכֶ֣לֶת <WH398> that eateth אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> blood וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and will cut him off אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5971> his people

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> For the life הַבָּשָׂר֮ <WH1320> of the flesh בַּדָּ֣ם <WH1818> [is] in the blood הִוא֒ <WH1931> he וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> and I נְתַתִּ֤יו <WH5414> and I have given לָכֶם֙ עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> it to you upon the altar לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> for נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> for your souls כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הַדָּ֥ם <WH1818> for it [is] the blood ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בַּנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the soul יְכַפֵּֽר׃ <WH3722> [that] maketh an atonement

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> after that אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> Therefore I said לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> No soul מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> among לֹא־ <WH3808> nor תֹ֣אכַל <WH398> of you shall eat דָּ֑ם <WH1818> blood וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> neither shall any stranger הַגָּ֥ר <WH1481> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶ֖ם <WH8432> among לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יֹ֥אכַל <WH398> you eat דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> blood ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> And whatsoever man אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> man מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [there be] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourn בְּתוֹכָ֔ם <WH8432> among אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָצ֜וּד <WH6679> you which hunteth צֵ֥יד <WH6718> and catcheth חַיָּ֛ה <WH2416> any beast אוֹ־ <WH176> or ע֖וֹף <WH5775> or fowl אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יֵאָכֵ֑ל <WH398> that may be eaten וְשָׁפַךְ֙ <WH8210> he shall even pour אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֔וֹ <WH1818> out the blood וְכִסָּ֖הוּ <WH3680> thereof and cover בֶּעָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> it with dust

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> For [it is] the life כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> of all flesh דָּמ֣וֹ <WH1818> the blood בְנַפְשׁוֹ֮ <WH5315> of it [is] for the life הוּא֒ <WH1931> I וָֽאֹמַר֙ <WH559> thereof therefore I said לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel דַּ֥ם <WH1818> the blood כָּל־ <WH3605> of any בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> of no manner of flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> Ye shall eat כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> for the life כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> of all flesh דָּמ֣וֹ <WH1818> [is] the blood הִ֔וא <WH1931> he כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever אֹכְלָ֖יו <WH398> thereof whosoever eateth יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> it shall be cut off

וְכָל־ <WH3605> any נֶ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> And every soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after תֹּאכַ֤ל <WH398> that eateth נְבֵלָה֙ <WH5038> that which died וּטְרֵפָ֔ה <WH2966> [of itself] or that which was torn בָּאֶזְרָ֖ח <WH249> [with beasts whether it be] one of your own country וּבַגֵּ֑ר <WH1616> or a stranger וְכִבֶּ֨ס <WH3526> he shall both wash בְּגָדָ֜יו <WH899> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <WH7364> and bathe בַּמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> [himself] in water וְטָמֵ֥א <WH2930> and be unclean עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> until the even וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> then shall he be clean

וְאִם֙ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְכַבֵּ֔ס <WH3526> But if he wash וּבְשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> his flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִרְחָ֑ץ <WH7364> [them] not nor bathe וְנָשָׂ֖א <WH5375> then he shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> his iniquity פ
